statements: SELECT * FROM credit_ratings;
SELECT client_id, credit_score FROM credit_ratings;
SELECT client_id, risk_assessment FROM credit_ratings WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM credit_ratings WHERE risk_assessment LIKE '%low%';
SELECT * FROM credit_ratings ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT client_id, credit_score, risk_assessment FROM credit_ratings WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT credit_score, risk_assessment, client_id FROM credit_ratings WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_ratings WHERE risk_assessment LIKE 'High Risk%' AND client_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT risk_assessment, client_id, credit_score FROM credit_ratings WHERE client_id IN (3, 5, 7) ORDER BY client_id;
SELECT client_id AS ID, credit_score AS Score, CONCAT(client_id, ' - ', risk_assessment) AS Client_Info FROM credit_ratings WHERE credit_score < 600;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT client_id, credit_rating FROM CreditRatings WHERE credit_rating > 700;
SELECT * FROM CreditRatings ORDER BY credit_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients WHERE client_id > 100 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, address, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT Clients.client_name, CreditRatings.credit_rating FROM Clients JOIN CreditRatings ON Clients.client_id = CreditRatings.client_id;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients WHERE client_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, credit_rating FROM clients WHERE credit_rating > 700;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM assessments GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_name, assessment_date, risk_level FROM clients JOIN assessments ON clients.client_id = assessments.client_id;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT client_name, credit_rating FROM clients WHERE credit_rating > 700 ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT client_name, assessment_date, risk_level FROM clients INNER JOIN assessments ON clients.client_id = assessments.client_id WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT client_id, count(assessment_id) AS assessment_count FROM assessments GROUP BY client_id HAVING count(assessment_id) > 3;
SELECT c.client_name, cs.score FROM clients c JOIN credit_scores cs ON c.client_id = cs.client_id WHERE cs.score = (SELECT MAX(score) FROM credit_scores);
SELECT * FROM clients
SELECT client_name, credit_rating FROM clients WHERE credit_rating > 700
SELECT client_name, credit_rating FROM clients ORDER BY credit_rating DESC
SELECT client_name, credit_rating FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3
SELECT clients.client_name, loans.amount FROM clients INNER JOIN loans ON clients.client_id = loans.client_id
SELECT client_id, client_name, credit_rating FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT clients.client_id, clients.client_name, loans.amount FROM clients JOIN loans ON clients.client_id = loans.client_id WHERE loans.amount > 10000;
SELECT client_name, credit_score FROM clients JOIN credit_scores ON clients.client_id = credit_scores.client_id WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT client_name, loan_id, amount FROM clients JOIN loans ON clients.client_id = loans.client_id WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT client_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM loans JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, credit_score FROM clients ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT client_name, loan_type FROM clients JOIN loans ON clients.client_id = loans.client_id;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT client_name, credit_score FROM clients WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT client_name, loan_amount, loan_type FROM clients c JOIN loans l ON c.client_id = l.client_id WHERE l.loan_type = 'Personal';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM clients c JOIN transactions t ON c.client_id = t.client_id WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT client_name, credit_rating, assessment_date FROM clients c JOIN credit_history ch ON c.client_id = ch.client_id WHERE credit_rating = 'Excellent';
